title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, enabling easy integration of local LLMs into Python applications.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, supporting both Node.js and browser environments.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, allowing use of local Ollama models within LangChain workflows.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat interface, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java client library for Ollama, providing Java applications access to local LLMs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust client library for Ollama, offering type-safe bindings and async support.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into the editor as an AI coding assistant.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot integration for Ollama, enabling community servers to chat with local LLMs.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI chat interface for Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface for Ollama, providing a quick way to build custom web apps around local LLMs.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app integrating Ollama models into web applications with REST endpoints and admin interface.

title: ollama-gradle-plugin
summary: Gradle plugin to download and manage Ollama models as part of Java/Kotlin build pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node for Ollama, enabling no-code workflows with local LLMs in automation pipelines.
